definition: camp/barracks/battalion/to build/to operate/to manage/to strive for
to raise (animals)/to bring up (children)/to keep (pets)/to support/to give birth

sentences.english: In part, nutritionists fell victim to a desire to simplify their dietary recommendations.
sentences.chinese: 部份原因在于营养学家太想把饮食建议简单化。

sentences.english: Advice from the nutritionist was not enough. Aminatou's family needed more.
sentences.chinese: 光有营养学家的建议是不够的。

sentences.english: Nutrition experts offer these simple tips to tame your urges.
sentences.chinese: 营养学家给你一些关于驯服自己渴望的小窍门。

sentences.english: This book makes a significant contribution to dietetics.
sentences.chinese: 此书对营养学有很大贡献。

sentences.english: According to Chinese nutrition, vegetables and fruits have “cold” energetic properties.
sentences.chinese: 从中国营养学来看，蔬菜水果是“寒”性的。

sentences.english: In the film, nutritionists say you shouldn't eat this food more than once a month.
sentences.chinese: 影片中，营养学家说你吃这种食物每月不要超过一次。

sentences.english: The Group of Pediatrics, Parenteral and Enteral Nutrition Society, Chinese Medical Association.
sentences.chinese: 中华医学会肠外肠内营养学分会儿科协作组。

sentences.english: The reality is that oils are extremely low in terms of nutritive value.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，油脂在营养学上的价值是十分低的。

sentences.english: You have a bad diet habit and I don't think you know dietetics.
sentences.chinese: 你的饮食习惯很差，我认为你对营养学一无所知。

sentences.english: This has always been emphasized by nutritionists.
sentences.chinese: 营养学家也总是强调此观点。

sentences.english: This is the website of Department of Food Science and Human Nutrition at University of Illinois.
sentences.chinese: 这是伊利诺斯大学食品科学和人类营养学系的网站。

sentences.english: Contemporary dietetics thinks, lemon has very high officinal value.
sentences.chinese: 现代营养学认为，柠檬具有很高的药用价值。

sentences.english: I went regularly to a nutritionist, a barber, and a masseuse.
sentences.chinese: 我定期去见营养学家，美容师和按摩师。

sentences.english: Nutritionists say parents shouldn’t be afraid to dress up the vegetables.
sentences.chinese: 营养学家说，父母不应该害怕烹调蔬菜。

sentences.english: The Pediatric Collaboratory Group, Parentral and Enteral Nutrition Society, Chinese Medical Association.
sentences.chinese: 中华医学会肠外肠内营养学分会儿科协作组。

definition: traditional Chinese medical science/a doctor trained in Chinese medicine
lit. food and medicine come from the same source (idiom)/fig. there is no clear-cut distinction between food and medicine
